roleset.name: move backwards or in the opposite direction, literally or to slip in quality

example.name: go from better to worse (quality example)
example.text: After his death, our literature retrograded.

example.name: move in a direction opposite to that of a reference point

roleset.note: RETROGRADE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from retrograde.01-v)
